programme.title: The Map Against The World
programme.desc: After his father dies due to an erroneous map, Kim Jeong-Ho sets out to make an accurate map of Joseon.

programme.title: Hwayi: A Monster Boy
programme.desc: A boy raised by five fathers attached to the criminal world is about to discover the sinister truth about his past when he is forced to pull the trigger when he tags along with his fathers on a job.

programme.title: Architecture 101
programme.desc: An architect gets an unexpected visit by his first love whom he hasn't seen in many years, bringing back all the memories from when they first met 15 years ago.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: A debt collector who has lost his sense of pain after a traumatic accident during his youth falls for a street vendor who suffers from severe hemophilia.

programme.title: Detective K: Secret Of Virtuous Widow
programme.desc: Joseon's top detective investigates a series of mysterious murders plaguing the country, uncovering disturbing secrets that link the murders to a massive conspiracy that will shake the whole nation.

programme.title: Sunflower
programme.desc: A former gangster released from prison wants to live a quiet life with his family. However, his efforts are threatened when a politician seeks to knock the family restaurant down to build a mall.

programme.title: No Mercy
programme.desc: On the journey to find her missing younger sister, she discovered the violence and sexual abuse her sister had suffered and is determined to take a revenge.

programme.title: Marriage Blue
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.title: Secret Reunion
programme.desc: A NIS agent is discharged after failing to stop the murder of a N. Korean dissident. Years later, he bumps into the N. Korean spy who was involved in the mission and quickly forms a bond.

programme.title: Don'T Go Too Far
programme.desc: While arguing on the division of their father's ₩2B inheritance, the eldest brother received a call to realize his son was kidnapped, and the ransom demanded was ₩2B...

programme.title: April Snow
programme.desc: A heart-piercing love story between two people, In-su and Seo-young, encountered under unexpected incident that began to shake their serene lives.

programme.title: Golden Slumber
programme.desc: A delivery man finds himself entwined in a dangerous conspiracy when he is accused of assassinating a presidential candidate. To stay alive, he must uncover the truth and clear his name.

programme.title: Men Of Plastic
programme.desc: A natural-born networker spot potential for business when he met a top plastic surgeon by chance. Together, they decided to open a whole new era of Apgujeong.

programme.title: A Special Lady
programme.desc: A woman who becomes the second-in-command of a gangster organization-turned-leading business entity, fights against the ruthless world of man's society, to protect her only son.

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: I Don'T Fire Myself
programme.desc: Being discriminated as a woman, Jeong-eun was dispatched and given great pressure to resign, but she is not willing to simply give up...

programme.title: The Foul King
programme.desc: A timid bank clerk discovers his talent as a wrestler by ways of cheating that no one had thought of. Yet frustrated to win solely by tricks, he decided to master moves in becoming a real wrestler.

programme.title: Emergency Declaration
programme.desc: Mysterious deaths on plane forced the pilot to call for an unconditional emergency landing.

programme.title: Iris: New Generation
programme.desc: Three years after a secret agent's tragic death at the hands of terrorist group IRIS, team leader Joon-han recruits a team to stop IRIS once and for all.

programme.title: Door Lock
programme.desc: A woman, living by herself, finds her door lock cover left open one day. Startled by this, she starts investigating on her own and finds more hints of someone trying to enter her home.

programme.title: The Map Against The World
programme.desc: After his father dies due to an erroneous map, Kim Jeong-Ho sets out to make an accurate map of Joseon.

programme.title: No Mercy
programme.desc: On the journey to find her missing younger sister, she discovered the violence and sexual abuse her sister had suffered and is determined to take a revenge.

programme.title: Punch
programme.desc: A dysfunctional mentor-mentee relationship is forged between a rebellious high school student from a poor household and his meddlesome homeroom teacher who moves in next door.

programme.title: South Bound
programme.desc: Choi Hae-gap has a family who will stand by his decisions given any scenario. As a team, they fight the government's plans to build a resort on the island of their ancestors.

programme.title: April Snow
programme.desc: A heart-piercing love story between two people, In-su and Seo-young, encountered under unexpected incident that began to shake their serene lives.

programme.title: Marriage Blue
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.title: Don'T Go Too Far
programme.desc: While arguing on the division of their father's ₩2B inheritance, the eldest brother received a call to realize his son was kidnapped, and the ransom demanded was ₩2B...

programme.title: She's On Duty
programme.desc: In order to catch a gangster, a cop goes undercover as a high school girl to get close to the gangster's daughter.

programme.title: My Sassy Girl
programme.desc: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

programme.title: Mr. Housewife
programme.desc: A dad enjoys his daily chores and taking care of his daughter at home. But when he faces financial trouble, he joins a TV game show to win the jackpot while pretending to be a housewife.

programme.title: Hot Young Bloods
programme.desc: In a rural town in 1982, a tough young girl secretly has a crush on a playboy. When a transfer student arrives, the playboy falls in love with her causing unexpected chaos at school.

programme.title: The Tooth And The Nail
programme.desc: Based on the novel of the same name by Bill S. Ballinger, the story tells of a magician who plans the most elaborate trick in order to uncover the hidden conspiracy behind his fiance's death.

programme.title: Decibel
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left buried in the deep sea to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: Delightfully Deceitful Ep4
programme.desc: Ro-woom is a genius scam artist who lacks empathy, and Moo-young is an attorney who is excessively empathetic by nature. To battle evil, these two opposites team up to form an unlikely alliance.

programme.desc: A fantasy romance between Shin Woo-yeo, a 999-year-old nine-tailed fox and Lee Dam, a college student who swallowed the fox’s pearl. Without it, Shin will not be able to attain the human form...

programme.title: Perfect Match (2017) Ep14
programme.desc: The brand new version of "Perfect Match", 24 female guests will be divided into think about zone and observation zone. The male guests will not show their appearance at that moment. programme.title: Melody Of Time Season 3 Ep4

programme.desc: "Chinese story" is a 30-minute feature program to promote overseas Chinese. The program records the struggles of outstanding overseas Chinese and tells their wonderful life stories.

programme.title: Bond with China Ep23
programme.desc: “Bond with China”, which is produced by China Media Group China Central Television International Channel, is a large-scale intercultural communication documentary program.

programme.title: Na Pian Hua Na Pian Hai Ep1
programme.desc: The story of the Qiongya Column during the three historical stages of the Agrarian Revolutionary War, the War of Resistance Against Japan and the War of Liberation from 1926 to 1949.

programme.title: Na Pian Hua Na Pian Hai Ep2
programme.desc: The story of the Qiongya Column during the three historical stages of the Agrarian Revolutionary War, the War of Resistance Against Japan and the War of Liberation from 1926 to 1949.

programme.title: Na Pian Hua Na Pian Hai Ep5

programme.title: China Showbiz Ep23
programme.desc: The China Showbiz gathers together a wide range of wonderful TV artistic works and directs viewers into a fabulous world of arts through works appreciation and review.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: It concentrates on the latest news and social changes happening in china and all over the world

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Report the Asia News on Asian view

programme.title: International Depth Ep2
programme.desc: International News Weekly Review

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep161
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Government’s policy of “one country, two systems” in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmen’s understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep78
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46304631
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2044
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3616
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2045
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep157
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3617

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1042
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep99
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health(M) Ep213214
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about one’s health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep449
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: The Wonder Woman(M) Ep89
programme.desc: Be a "shark", if you're a woman, to survive in your working and personal relationship? DU,AI-SHA, also known as Shark, is aggressive and ruthless YI,FEI-YANG nickname is "Orca". Orcas kills sharks. That implies the relationship between them. They are friends and foes at the same time. They show no mercy and never surrender. Love comes and goes but friendship lasts forever. AI-SHA doesn't want to lose her best friend YI,FEI-YANG. She doesn't need love, but she needs him.

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: This movie is inspired by the true story of real-life hero Huo Yuan Jia. When a fight destroys the reputation of this renowned martial arts champion along with the lives of his family, Huo’s path to redemption brings him face-to-face with the most ferocious opponents in the world.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: The Incredible Monk
programme.desc: Daoji, a mystic monk during the Southern Song dynasty, has been tasked to protect the people from monsters. However, when the Emperor dies under suspicious circumstances, Daoji uncovers an evil conspiracy and must seek help from the Emperor of the Gods and five of the strongest demigods to combat the dark forces threatening the world!

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police inspector, Lin Dong, had to protect an important witness in his mission thirteen years ago. This not only forced him to be separated from his daughter, but also got him involved in a conspiracy spanning more than a decade.

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOU’RE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE – consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s’ Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang’s first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt’s puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face life’s mounting hardships.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: Qian, a rich boy obsessed with martial arts, joins a Kung Fu school where he meets and falls for the youngest daughter of the school master. Being a normal student, he meets a mysterious man who teaches him kung fu that allows him to win a duel and marry his love. It is then that the mysterious man's identity is finally revealed.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xing’s son attempts drug trafficking to save his father’s studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman.
programme.desc: This is a romantic comedy about a quarrelsome and loving couple whose spirits are being swapped over after a thunderstorm. The sexy lady finds herself carrying an ugly man’s spirit, and vice versa. Can they switch their spirits back, or do they need to get use to the situation for the rest of their lives?

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend’s wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge – will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: Monster Hunt
programme.desc: The pregnant queen of the monster realm flees a civil war and lands in human world, near Yung Ning Village. She seeks the help of a wimpy villager to become the surrogate father for her child, Wuba. From the time he was born, little Wuba embarks on a thrilling journey to escape from those who want to capture him at all costs.

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Ip Man
programme.desc: Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man’s matchless fighting skills are revered all over China. Set during the Sino-Japanese War, Ip Man is forced to leave his home and work to support his family. With only his martial arts skills, he reluctantly agrees to train others in the art of Wing Chun for self-defense.

programme.title: From Beijing With Love
programme.desc: Stephen Chow writes, directs & stars in this hilarious James Bond spoof that sees the Chinese government assign their worst secret agent (Chow) to recover a stolen dinosaur skull.

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again…

programme.title: Hail the Judge
programme.desc: A low level magistrate is run out of town for defending a beautiful murder suspect. Through a series of comedic events he ascends to the top rank & returns looking for revenge.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: 12 Golden Ducks
programme.desc: This is a comeback story about the misadventures of a group of gigolos, led by Future, trying to make their mark in Hong Kong. As with any profession, they have their share of setbacks, but their ability to find laughter within the tears reflects the drive, passion and the indomitable spirit of the Hong Kong people.

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chef’s delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the team’s downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return…

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fiancé left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his family’s massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people’s livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: The Kid With The Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yang's employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to trap Wong’s disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong thus to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: The Jade Faced Assassin
programme.desc: Two forbidden lovers, Zhang Zhen and Yue Nu, are killed by four villains and left behind their twin babies. Yue Nu's elder sister hopes to restore the clan's honour and separates the twins, arranging for them to be raised by competing clans. 18 years later, the twins meet and fight against each other, bringing chaos to the martial arts world.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: Shaolin Prince
programme.desc: As the names of Chang Cheh and Liu Chia-liang became legendary, all-too-often the name of their equally valued collaborator, Tang Chia, is omitted. That may be, because, unlike the previous pair, the veteran kung-fu choreographer only went on to direct three movies of his own. Of course, that makes this trio all the more special, and this first effort perhaps the most special of all. It may be an eye-filling, mind-bending martial arts tale of two royal princes battling for the rightful recovery of the throne, but it's also a party, where Tang invites two cinematographers, three editors, and no less than five other choreographer friends to almost literally shoot the works. The results are kung-fu configurations not only never seen before, but never even imagined!

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriend’s baby...

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor is dying with no heir to succeed the throne. His brother recalls that he has an illegitimate child with a court lady years ago and palace guards are sent to search for the heir. When the Emperor's nephew hires assassins to kill the child so he can be the successor, the Swift Knight comes to the rescue…

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the master’s granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: Finger Of Doom
programme.desc: The protagonists are ex-swordmasters who now find joy in making umbrellas. They track down the evil Madame Kung Sun and her poisonous “Finger of Doom”, a unique supernatural power which allows her to transform normal, everyday people into horrifying zombies, and this is just the start of their mythical adventure against this zombie maker!

programme.title: The Bride From Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his family’s declining status. Lin visits his fiancée before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lin’s bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: Long Road To Gallantry
programme.desc: Tu Meng Fei makes his way to the world after completing his kung fu training. En route, he rescues Mu Wan Erh and Li San Nan from a band of thugs and later learnt of a 20-year conflict between the evil Thunder Gang Chief Leng Tian Lei and the Dragon Sect. Mu’s lost father is none other than the Thunder Gang Chief, who also killed Li’s father…

programme.title: Masked Avengers
programme.desc: The "godfather of the kung-fu film," Chang Cheh, started a winning streak by making the internationally renowned THE FIVE VENOMS. He followed that hit with many more high-flying "bloody good" entertainments featuring the same cast in new roles. But of all the "Venom" movies, this one stands out as perhaps the most chilling. Masked killers are wreaking havoc and instilling terror with their vicious weapons of choice: razor-sharp, gut-shattering tridents. Only three fearless fighters dare investigate, leading to mass murder and magnificent martial arts. Chien Hsiao-hou, future co-star of Yuen Woo-ping's THE TAI-CHI MASTER joins the trio to get tri-pierced. The core "Venoms" themselves handle the intricate, always impressive, sometimes awe-inspiring, choreography in this unforgettable exercise in "grand guignol kung-fu."

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a police’s son, blames his father for his mother’s death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: Tales Of A Eunuch
programme.desc: Tales Of A Eunuch reunites the potent mix of martial arts superstar Gordon Liu Chia-hui, who plays Emperor in cognito Kang Hsi, with the kung-fu comedienne Wang Yu, an anti-Ching revolutionary. It is a film laced with wild barrages of excellent martial arts chiefly choreographed by Yuen Hua and Yuan Pien; Jackie Chan's long-time kung-fu classmates. At one time, Wang was considered to be the next Alexander Fu Sheng.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Ten Tigers Of Kwang Tung
programme.desc: The Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung is a group of anti-Ching martial artists who have killed a Ching official. Years later, when five disciples and descendants of Ten Tigers meet one night, one of them is killed by the son of the late Ching official who returns with a vengeance. They must fight against him to protect the Ten Tigers clan…

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiancée Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wang's friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon’s clutches.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends’ help.

programme.title: Kid From Kwangtung
programme.desc: After many years as a respected actor and action choreographer, the Shaw Studio finally gave the dependable and commendable Hsu Hsia a chance to direct his own movies. He didn't waste the opportunity, inviting three other kung-fu designers to help on this fight-filled thriller. Wang Yu, co-star of such classics as Dirty Ho and The Kid With A Tattoo, here takes center stage as a young rascal caught between an anti-Ching Confederation and violent, vengeful Ching troops. But when he discovers that the good guys are led by master martial arts actor Jen Shih-kuan and the bad guys are led by the incredible Huang Cheng-li everyone knows that loads of great kung-fu is in store.

programme.title: The Comedy Of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sister’s wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The film is about a Chinese martial arts school finds itself outclassed by their rivals, they hire elite ninja from Japan to destroy the school. The lone survivor of the massacre learns the secrets of ninjutsu and seeks revenge against the ninja.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: Return Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: One of Shaw Studio’s highest grossing movies ever, this is the story of Li Chin Huan, the renowned, charming and sentimental swordsman who must fight many opponents, including an evil Clan Chief, for a place in the martial arts world.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: The formidable swordswoman Silver Fox was a child when her father was senselessly wounded by his step brother, and her mother raped. It is payback time eighteen years later, as her father trains her up with kung fu to take revenge on his behalf.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: Shoot 'Em Up
programme.desc: Mr. Smith, the angriest, most hardboiled man in the world, finds himself entrusted to protect the most innocent thing of all--a newborn child. When Smith delivers the baby in the middle of a gunfight, he soon discovers that the infant is the target of a shadowy force that has sent a team of mysterious and endless assailants, led by Hertz, to erase all traces of the baby. Amid a hail of bullets and facing every conceivable permutation of gunfight, Smith teams up with a prostitute named DQ to solve the mystery as to why the baby's life is being threatened before this makeshift family all ends up on the wrong side of a bullet. Everyone wants the baby dead. The big question is why?

programme.title: Red Riding Hood
programme.desc: Valerie is a beautiful young woman torn between two men. She is in love with a brooding outsider Peter, but her parents have arranged for her to marry the wealthy Henry. Unwilling to lose each other, Valerie and Peter are planning to run away together when they learn that Valerie's older sister has been killed by the werewolf that prowls the dark forest surrounding their village. Father Solomon, a famous werewolf hunter, warns that the wolf, who takes human form by day, could be any one of them. As the death toll rises with each moon, Valerie begins to suspect that the werewolf could be someone she loves. Panic grips the town as Valerie discovers that she has a unique connection to the beast.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Deserts - Behind the facade of Australia’s dramatic scenery is a motley crew of silent assassins, con artists, gang members and brutal brawlers, vying for supremacy amidst the harsh, dry and desolate Australian desert. Competition for resources is so fierce, its animal residents have developed some ingenious methods of survival.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Jungle Juniors - Every year, more than 200,000 monkeys in Peru are trafficked illegally. Almost all are babies. Watch as these little ones learn to survive without their moms and try to make new friends along the way.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Haven of Giants - Lewa Conservancy is working to return elephants to territory from Mt. Kenya to Samburu National Park. They've also created an elephant exclusion zone to try and restore a damaged ecosystem. Radio tracking collars are used for both initiatives to help conservationists better understand the elephants’ needs - and to see if they're returning to their natural corridors.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Ivory Wars - Elephant hunting has been banned in Kenya for 40 years. Organized gangs of armed poachers are still targeting elephants, illegally hunting them and selling their ivory tusks on the black market. Environmentalists and conservationists are sounding the alarm.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Episode 8 - Join the rescue team as they respond to a call about an opossum stuck in a fence that turns out not to be the kind of animal that plays dead. Inside the center, a goose with a serious foot injury receives physiotherapy before returning to the wild.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Namaqualand: the Desert Bloom - For most of the year it’s a desert, but during early August and September the dusty valleys of Namaqualand transform into a wonderland carpeted with wildflowers. Witness this magnificent transformation from arid desert to beautiful oasis.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Group Survival - For a great many species, the structures of group living are the most important for survival. Although social living is integral to many of the animals that call the Rocky Mountains home, no two species organize their society in the same way. Even among closely related species there can be drastic differences in social structure; communication, hierarchy, mating, and diet are all inextricably informed by specific environmental and genetic adaptations for group survival.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - It’s spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Episode 9 - Follow an injured opossum into surgery, as the medical team realizes amputation may be the only way to save his badly injured toe. And meet some turtle hatchlings who seem ready for release when the team gets disappointing details about their size.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - It’s spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Deserts - Behind the facade of Australia’s dramatic scenery is a motley crew of silent assassins, con artists, gang members and brutal brawlers, vying for supremacy amidst the harsh, dry and desolate Australian desert. Competition for resources is so fierce, its animal residents have developed some ingenious methods of survival.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Jungle Juniors - Every year, more than 200,000 monkeys in Peru are trafficked illegally. Almost all are babies. Watch as these little ones learn to survive without their moms and try to make new friends along the way.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Haven of Giants - Lewa Conservancy is working to return elephants to territory from Mt. Kenya to Samburu National Park. They've also created an elephant exclusion zone to try and restore a damaged ecosystem. Radio tracking collars are used for both initiatives to help conservationists better understand the elephants’ needs - and to see if they're returning to their natural corridors.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Ivory Wars - Elephant hunting has been banned in Kenya for 40 years. Organized gangs of armed poachers are still targeting elephants, illegally hunting them and selling their ivory tusks on the black market. Environmentalists and conservationists are sounding the alarm.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Episode 10 - Meet a flock of cedar waxwings who have taken over the center’s aviary and are keeping the staff busy with endless demands for food. Then the rescue team works with the Ministry of Natural Resources to relocate a coyote that’s too people-friendly.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep11
programme.desc: Episode 11 - Join the rescue team for a madcap chase after a red-tailed hawk. He may be unable to fly, but he sure can run! Then follow the recovery of a rare albino squirrel who can’t walk, and see how the medical team ensures he’ll be ready for the wild again.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep5
programme.desc: De Hoop: Place of Hope - This small park makes a big difference to endangered animals. Offering sanctuary to some of the biggest and smallest animals on the planet, witness how species come back from the edge of extinction to reclaim their place in Africa’s wilderness.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 Ep1
programme.desc: And So it Begins… - Head to the heart of Central Kalimantan, Borneo - home to one of the most unique schools in the world. There are 68 students in all, including class clown Valentino (who loves a short-cut) and class couple Darril and Liti (who have their first fight).

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Oceans - Australia is home to the world’s most toxic, venomous and dangerous creatures. From the oceans to the forest, swamps and deserts, it’s a continent teeming with a hugely disproportionate number of creatures that can envenomate, poison or maim.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Weird, Wild & Wonderful - Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep1

They've also created an elephant exclusion zone to try and restore a damaged ecosystem. programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Fickle River - Travel to Samburu, where matriarch Anastasia turns her elephant herd north after a local river dries up. Then, in Naboisho, see cheetah mom Kuleta evade a crafty pack of hyenas. Later, in Laikipia, check in on wild dog Phoenix and her new litter.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Blood and Dust - Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuleta’s loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Blood and Dust - Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuleta’s loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep12
programme.desc: Episode 12 - Check in with the centre’s resident turkey vulture, who’s ready for release and in search of a flock. While Nathalie and her team rush to secure funding for a new facility, the medical team is baffled by a toad who has mysteriously taken ill.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Apex Predators - Apex predators seem to have won the evolutionary lottery. These species hunt and kill with superior strength, and attack with impressive strategy and mechanics. They are at the top of their game and at the top of the food chain.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tidal Forest of Africa - We follow the South African mangrove forest and its residents through the change from high tide to low and back to high, meeting the red-claw mangrove crabs that keep the forest clean, helping it provide food and shelter for a variety of species.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Okavango: Lifeblood of the Kalahari - Take a look at one of Africa’s most abundant and diverse wildlife areas, the Okavango Delta. Investigate the way the delta functions and learn about the variety of interesting species that live in the area.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Urban Penguins - Living on the southwestern tip of Africa is an unusual colony of African penguins. Most African penguins prefer to breed on off-shore islands in the region, but human interference on their island homes has caused many birds to look elsewhere for suitable breeding sites.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Precious Waters - Life in the savannas of Africa is ruled by water. And throughout the long dry season, life-giving rivers run dry and harsh drought conditions prevail, making waterholes crowded.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bound By Blood - The southwest corner of New Zealand’s South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean. Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions. The sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, where pups must battle the elements to survive.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life in Dark Water - In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Age of Independence - The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world – the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snares Islands/ Tini Heke - Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Origin Stories - Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years’ worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Allies and Adversaries - Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earth’s oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep12
programme.desc: Episode 12 - Check in with the centre’s resident turkey vulture, who’s ready for release and in search of a flock. While Nathalie and her team rush to secure funding for a new facility, the medical team is baffled by a toad who has mysteriously taken ill.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Vrederfort Dome - Crater of Life - In this programme we look at the Vredefort Crater in South Africa and the life it supports. From rocky outcrops to grassland, and from wetlands to mighty rivers, each habitat provides a niche for a host of creatures.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Age of Independence - The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world – the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.desc: Linguine, Farfalle, Bologna, Ragu - Michela Chiappa shows how easy it is to make pasta at home and visits Bologna to look into what makes pasta great.

programme.desc: Homes - Join us as we take a look at a world of different luxuries each week. In this episode, we get to peek inside the world's most luxurious homes.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep42
programme.desc: Skunked! / Neighborhood Bird Watch - Archibald can’t wait to celebrate his Hatch Day with his family inside an impossibly fun theme park. But when Archibald accidentally gets sprayed by a skunk, he must try to get rid of his stank before his special day is ruined. / When Archibald overhears something suspicious about a neighbor, he reports it to his aunts who run the Neighborhood Bird Watch. With Archibald as their new recruit, they attempt to expose the neighbor’s suspicious shenanigans.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep50
programme.desc: My Big Fat Gran Wedding / The Strutting Edge - After being called out for having commitment issues by Grug, Gran decides to make the ultimate commitment: marrying Mow!; After embarrassingly choking at the prior Valley's “beastie Pageant”, Eep asks previous winner Gran to train her to be the best

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep23
programme.desc: Lucky And The Role Reversal - After Aunt Cora moves out, Lucky tries to live a life without rules.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep49
programme.desc: Richie Rich And The Tapir Of Doom / Dollar Dollar Saves Y'All - Tiny and Lucretia sign on as sidekicks in Richie's search for a legendary treasure. Dollar's desperate to prove he's the Best Good Boy.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep49
programme.desc: Worst In Show/Belle Of The Gumball - Whiplash finds a perfect poodle moth to enter to compete in the show; Chet attends a gala with a rich snail after he's named "Handsomest Snail Alive".

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep5
programme.desc: The Amazing Donna / Bye, Bye Boardie - When Donna decides to show off her not-so-flashy skills as a magician at the Community Center talent show, the Zenkos must do everything they can to save her act from becoming an embarrassing disaster. / After Sam’s favorite skateboard accidentally gets put in with donations Mr. Tanaka is collecting for a fundraiser, the team is led on a merry chase as the skateboard passes from one Harmony Harbor denizen to another.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep42
programme.desc: Skunked! / Neighborhood Bird Watch - Archibald can’t wait to celebrate his Hatch Day with his family inside an impossibly fun theme park. programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep15
programme.desc: Hair-Jitsu / Crushin' It - Branch must learn the importance of patience when Poppy teaches him "hair-jitsu"/Smidge tones down her forceful Smidge-ness when she forms a crush on the village critter-narian

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep4
programme.desc: Egg Nag/Game On - The Mighty Ones accidentally knock a bird's Egg out of its nest and must take turns trying to incubate the incredibly annoying Egg until it hatches. / The Mighty Ones move into a board game in the yard that they believe to be a "city," and it's all fun and games until Berry's capitalist greed gets the best of her.

programme.desc: Save The Cat - The search continues as Puss, Dulcinea, Artephius and Toby must complete task after task to gather the San Lorenzans and defeat the thieves who have a dangerous plan for the

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive - Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.desc: Hair-Jitsu / Crushin' It - Branch must learn the importance of patience when Poppy teaches him "hair-jitsu"/Smidge tones down her forceful Smidge-ness when she forms a crush on the village critter-narian

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep30
programme.desc: Hole In The Sky - After an emergency beacon draws Team Voltron to an ancient derelict Altean ship stuck in a temporal rift, the team is transported to an alternate universe.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep30
programme.desc: 127 Owwws / 28 Fleas Later - Eep and Thunk become obsessed with a new trend known as “quicktogramming”/Grug accidentally causes the first outbreak of a “super bug”

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep30
programme.desc: Chercophonie / Oh, Man, And The Sea - Tip becomes a Boovsland rock icon due to her awful guitar playing; When Donny takes Oh fishing, they battle a giant Sturgeon

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep30
programme.desc: Climate Control / Ziryab - When Hobson gives Peabody and Sherman a weather-controlling device, they can't agree on a temperature and cause a massive storm flood in the Penthouse

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep30
programme.desc: Lucky And The Two-Wheeled Terror - When Lucky and the PALs arrive home from the circus, they find that Maricela and her new bicycle have become the star attraction in Miradero

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep17
programme.desc: The Terror Of Tickula / Prank'D - Turbo and Whiplash meet a strange tick who may be out to harm Turbo.//When the crew starts a prank war, Chet is nervous that he is the next target.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep7
programme.desc: Why Warthog Is Ugly - You see there was a time when Warthog was really rather handsome. And did he know it! He strutted around Tinga Tinga as if he owned the place. All the animals were fed up with Warthog's boasting, and then one day Lion decided to give chase. Yikes! Warthog ran headfirst into Porcupines burrow! After that, he was no longer the prettiest beast in Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep8
programme.desc: Why Owls Head Turns All The Way Round - You see there was a time when Owl's head didn't turn all the way round. She had tiny little eyes and tiny little ears, and she found it very hard to stay awake. Then one day all the Mangoes started disappearing in Tinga Tinga. Against all the animals better judgement, Owl was ordered to watch over the Mango tree … but the mangoes kept disappearing. Desperate to catch the thief, Owl stretched and strained to see who was stealing the precious mangoes, until Ker-Swhing! Her head turned all the way round and she saw who it was… It was the ants! From that day on Owl was made the official night guard of Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep59
programme.desc: My Friend Fifi - Fifi and Bumble fall out in a big way after Fifi doesn't show up to the picnic they are supposed to have together. How strange that Stingo is trying to get them to be friends again, or is it?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep60
programme.desc: Diggly'S Big Adventure - Diggly is bored of life on his compost heap and wants to see round the rest of the garden. Fifi offers to give him a guided tour. Diggly gets lost, how will he get home?

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep7
programme.desc: Who Wants To Live In Baa'S Meadow? - Baa's feeling lonely as his buddy Billie the mouse has gone off for the day. Jess goes hunting for someone to come to the meadow to live with Baa. He find a fish to live in the trough, but there's no pond weed for him to live, he tries Sammy snail but he carries his own home on his back so he doesn't need a new home, finally they realise that there are ants already living with Baa in the meadow.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep8
programme.desc: Why Are The Ants Visiting Mimi? - Mimi's painting a lovely picture at her hutch, with Jess along for a visit. Suddenly she's collapses in fits of tickly giggles, there are ants everywhere.. Mimi can't paint, tho, whilst she's being tickled and Jess works out they are here for her honey sandwiches!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep43
programme.desc: Doc Doc Who'S There?/Tour Guide Of Duty - In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. But could it be that this is her true calling?/ Branch is sick of Trolls not coming to him with their problems. Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Strange Strife Of The Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Flustering Mindless Woe Of The Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep3
programme.desc: Family Fun Night - The Templetons head to a new family restaurant only to run into Bootsy Calico!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep4
programme.desc: Formula For Menace: A Dekker Moonboots Mystery - When Baby Corp babies start aging, panic hits the office and the babies set out to find out if someone has been tainting the formula

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep76
programme.desc: All Hail, Puss! - With the earthquakes in San Lorenzo becoming unmanageable, Puss turns to the sky gods, who give him mighty powers

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep50
programme.desc: Cj Wooferbug/What Did I Miss - DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJ’s birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep50
programme.desc: Koto, Plain And Tall - Julien is lost in the jungle and accidentally saves a Mountain Lemur named Koto who turns out to be the biggest threat the kingdom has ever faced

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep24
programme.desc: Lucky And The Patchwork Plan - Lucky and her friends try to prevent Aunt Cora from leaving Miradero.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep10
programme.desc: Yukon Do It! - Arf gets a chance to run with real sled dogs when he travels with Wally and Wenda to wintry northern Canada to deliver an important package to Wizard Whitebeard, who is off watching the Northern Lights with a fellow wizard.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep4
programme.desc: Show Dog, Show \ Keys To Victory - Tag can't wait to show off her car at the car show. But when Cheddar Biscuit wants to come along and pick up her clown friends along the way, Tag is wary that Cheddar Biscuit will steal her thunder. \ The Not Yet Cadets can't wait to watch Sam’s big race. But when Sam loses his car key, he challenges the Not Yet Cadets to race around town to find it.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep6
programme.desc: Lula'S Last Stand / Triple Trouble - Little Lula has set up a lemonade stand, but she’s not getting any business. The Zenkos swing into action to send customers her way. / When Donna, Fawna and Rona have a spat, the triplets’ longstanding annual tradition of viewing a comet together is in jeopardy. Now it’s up to Team Zenko to get the three feuding sisters back together again before the comet streaks by.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep4
programme.desc: Where There'S Smoke - After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep9
programme.desc: The Case Of The Stolen Key - It's the day of the Toyland Singalong and Clockwork Mouse, an enthusiastic but awful singer, says everything must be perfect! But then her precious key goes missing and Noddy need to quickly investigate: Who stole Clockwork Mouse's key?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep10
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Banner - The banner for Revs' Air show has disappeared. Where can it be ? Could someone be trying to spoil Revs' show? Noddy investigates.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep43
programme.desc: Tumbleweed Wrangler / The Extreme Bean Machine - Archibald is excited to visit Roxlyn for a western-themed day together in Saddlerock. However, when Saddlerock gets overrun with tumbleweeds, they are determined not to let them spoil their perfect day. / Needing a win, Cousin Ashley enters a road race that features car innovations. With Archibald’s help, Ashley will try to overcome obstacles both mental and physical, all the while driving a car that runs on baked beans.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep51

Valley, Grug throws a giant party to force them to become best friends

programme.desc: Hard To Gettings / Tummy Fish - After Oh goes on a date with Sharzod, she wants to be in a serious relationship; When the parasites who live in Oh's tummy emerge, Tip is surprised to discover that she is a celebrity to them.

programme.desc: Brain Switch / Koikawa Harumachi - When Peabody uses a brain-switching machine to let Sherman find out what it's like to be grown up, Sherman likes it so much he refuses to switch back

programme.desc: Over Shadowed / Beware The Chickipede - White Shadow quits racing and it's up to Turbo to convince him to get back on the track.//The crew becomes detectives and meets a strange new creature.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep9
programme.desc: Why Monkeys Swing In The Trees - You see there was a time when Monkey used to play on the ground and he loved to wind up Crocodile. One day the Big Rains came and Monkey got stranded up the Mango Tree. Nasty Crocodile promised to take him to dry land…. But only in exchange for one thing…. His HEART! Monkey tricked Crocodile and when Crocodile found out that Monkey swapped his heart for a measley mango, he chased Monkey up a tree. From that day on Monkey swings in the trees keeping well clear of Crocodiles angry snaps! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep10
programme.desc: Why Tickbird Sits On Hippos Back - You see there was a time when Tickbird didn't sit on Hippo's back, infact they weren't friends at all! Tickbird was sick of Hippo splashing all the time. One day tiny Tickbird challenges big Hippo to a contest… who can drink the most water in a single gulp! Tickbird outwits Hippo by using the tides and from that day she is allowed to sit on Hippo's back and pick off all the yummy ticks she can eat! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep61
programme.desc: Pip'S Playground - Pip is feeling bored and wants something new to play. Fifi has a brilliant idea and asks all the tots to help her build a playground for Pip as a surprise.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep62
programme.desc: Mud Sculptures - It has been raining and the garden is muddy. The tots decide to make mud sculptures. But what will they all do with the sculptures when they are finished?

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep9
programme.desc: Why Do Spiders Build Webs? - The friends are having a tidying up day. Frightened Baa doesn't like spiders or their webs but Jess helps him to stop being scared by working out that Spiders build webs to catch their supper, and Baa feels re-assured and happy. Spiders are rather nice, rather clean and rather clever.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep10
programme.desc: How Can We Bring The Outside Inside? - Poor Willow has a sore hoof and has to stay inside until it's better. She's really missing her orchard so Jess and Mimi are determined to bring something of the outside to Willow to cheer her up. A tree is too big and it's too late in the year for apples. Jess works out that they can make beautiful tree and leaf rubbings into a wonderful tree collage for the stable to remind Willow of her orchard.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep44
