programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Apple Picking - The apples on the apple tree are ripe and the friends are super excited to go to pick them! They will make puree, juice, tarts, but also eat them straight! But the tree has grown since last year and the apples are hard to reach...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep150
programme.desc: The Talking Flower - Anna would like to paint a new picture, and Ron his favourite flower: Jaunita. When Anna starts to paint Ron and his flower, Christopher hides behind a bush to trick him and make him believe the flower is a talking back to him.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Blue's Storytime with Camila - We dive deeper into American Sign Language and the Deaf community. Camila the librarian wants to tell a story with us using ASL, but what story? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Mini-Patrol / Pups Save a Lost Tooth - Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol, recruitng Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny. // Alex loses his first tooth, then really loses it.The tooth must be located before the Tooth Fairy comes!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Pups Save Ace's Birthday Surprise - Rocky and the Pups are fixing an Old-Timey Junk Car for Ace Sorensen's Birthday!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Gravity Calamity / Ball of Chaos - Sir Steel gets Professor Scratch to create an anti-gravity ray, which goes wrong in the hands of Ricardo! // Muffin's super bouncy ball threatens to wreck the annual Winter Festival! Kai learns to sacrifice something he loves for the greater good!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Lola's Air Display / Down The Sewers - Lola is worried her air display will not be impressive enough, but when Sir Steel joins, the air display goes wrong in a spectacular way! // When Sir Steel's dog Muffin's ball goes missing down the sewers, Bobbi has to face his fear of the dark.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Paddington and the Bone / Paddington Joins a Band - Mr. Gruber has been loaned a T-Rex Skeleton, but Lucky the dog has stolen the priceless bone and buried it somewhere. // The kids decide to form a rock band with Paddington, but what instrument should he play, and what is rock music?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Pancakes - Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep325
programme.desc: Pups Raise the PAW Patroller / Pups Save the Crows - Daring Danny’s at it again, luckily the Pups are able to raise their rig after Danny sinks the Paw Patroller. // Ryder and the Pups pair up with Alex and his mini patrol to retrieve mysteriously missing items.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep326
programme.desc: Pups Save Floating Friends / Pups Save a Satellite - The alien’s spaceship is on the fritz and shooting out anti-gravity rays. Ryder and the pups need to repair the spaceship. // A satellite is out of orbit and falling towards Adventure Bay, the PAW patrol must fix it before it crash lands.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Tour Fishies / Sorry Not Sorry - When Finnegan Travelfins leaves Carnivore Cove out of his travel guide, Baby and William make a video to show off their town! // Shadow's insincere apologies put a strain on his friendship with Bait and Switch.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Treat Goblin / Baby Super Shark - Goldie blames her missing treats on a monster. // Vigo's plan to turn everyfishy into babies backfires.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Santiago's Greatest Treasure / The Golden Banana Treasure - When Bonnie Bones steals a chest of pirate treasures, Santiago learns just how much he needs his crew. // Santi and crew navigate the tricky Banana Island to save a baby monkey and its treasure from Enrique.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Enchanted Melody / Chicken Abuelo - When Escarlata gets ahold of an enchanted guitar riff, all of the underseas may soon fall under her spell. // Tomás accidentally turns Abuelo into a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Polly's Holiday - Granny and Grandpa’s pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep241
programme.desc: Pen Pal - Peppa has a French pen pal, a girl donkey, named Delphine. They also speak to each other on the telephone. Although Peppa speaks English and Delphine speaks French, they discover that they love lots of the same things.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep249
programme.desc: The Powercut - One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppa’s house is plunged into darkness. There has been a power cut. While they wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch and thinking of games to play.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Shadows - Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches - The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep509
programme.desc: The Great Space Race - Blaze and AJ take off into space for a race that's out of this world! Along the way to Planet Victory, they meet friendly aliens, dodge asteroids, and face off against Crusher's space ship!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep508
programme.desc: The Gold Medal Games - It's time for the Gold Medal Games, and Blaze is ready to compete! But when Crusher cheats and sends his rival flying far away, Blaze has to speed back to Axle City to beat the buzzer and win that medal!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Pups and the Beanstalk / Pups Save the Turbots - Rubble decides to nap under a tree at Farmer Yumi’s when suddenly Adventure Bay gets a huge problem - Alex the Giant! // When Cap'n Turbot needs to get a picture of a rare bird, his French cousin decides to help but gets caught on a cliff!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Pups Great Race / Pups Take the Cake - It's Race Day and the pups are about to race each other across the town to see who is the fastest. // Mr. Porter enters a cake competition and needs Ryder and the pups to help him. The race is on to get the cake baked and to the competition on time!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Legendary Loot / Yup Day - After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down. // Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Sink or Swim - The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Paddington and the FIngertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooter - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington gets stuck to Mr. Curry while auditioning for a play. // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy play imaginary games and Judy and Mateo decide they might have more fun playing with them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping - The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them? // Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Pottery - Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Paper Aeroplanes - Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing – because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Edmond Elephant's Birthday - Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep426
programme.desc: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World - Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Sheep Doggy! - When Farmer Joe's cute baby lamb wanders off the farm during a popcorn storm, Bubble Puppy becomes a sheepdog to save the day!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Something New at Blue's School - Join Josh and Blue at school for a day of trying new things! Josh is excited to try being Teacher for the Day, but Blue seems nervous to try something. What could it be?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Joshini The Amazing - Periwinkle is planning a magic show! The Amazing Joshini and YOU, are eager to perform the greatest magic trick the Blue's Clues house has ever seen! But which one? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Magic Spyglass / The Stone of Life - Santi and crew are after the legendary Magic Spyglass! But things get tricky when Enrique Real de Palacios III joins the chase. / Santi and crew follow a map to a special treasure, but Bonnie and Sir Butterscotch are hot on their trail.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Santiago's Greatest Treasure - When Bonnie Bones steals a chest of pirate treasures, Santiago learns just how much he needs his crew.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Call Me Billiam - When Rayna asks William to be more responsible, he sets out to become a grownup fishy named Billiam.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Pups Save Bedtime - The Turbots are trapped somewhere in the jungle. They tried to call the Paw Patrol, but their phone cut out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Pups Save a Goldrush / Pups Save the Paw Patroller - When a grizzled old prospector discovers gold in Adventure Bay, it’s a bona fide, dog gone, gold rush! // When Mayor Humdinger and the Kit-tastrophe Crew try to steal the Paw Patroller, the chase becomes a rescue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Gym Class - Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit tells the kids about how he explored a jungle, helping the kids get over their fears.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep248
programme.desc: Bouncy Ball - Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets. She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out. Will the job of ball boy cheer him up?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep322
programme.desc: Grandpa at the Playground - Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Goldie the Fish - Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep324
programme.desc: Fun Fair - The family go to the funfair, but Mummy Pig is angry when people at the fair tell her that she will not be able to win prizes in the competitions, just like George is sad because the mini golf course is too big for him.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep153
programme.desc: Smile Day - When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep154
programme.desc: No Panic ! - Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep303
programme.desc: No Time Like The Present Store - At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure - Josh and Blue are having a playdate with our friend Rainbow Puppy, who makes everything extra exciting! We play a special game of Rainbow Puppy's Clues to figure out where she wants to go, leaping from skidoo to skidoo and looking for clues.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Pups Save a Robosaurus / Pups Save a Film Festival - When a homemade Robotic Dino named Earl comes to life, the pups need to find him, stop him, and bring him home. // The pups are shooting their Film Festival entry until Daring Danny X cuts the action with his dangerous stunt.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Small Is Smashing / Pine Cone Power Up - Sir Steel wants to shrink the trees in the Central Forest to make way for his new tower. Deer Squad have to think small to stop him! // Lola and her souped-up Rocket Rabbit wake the residents of the Central Forest with all the engine's roars.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Steel Antlers / Berry Bad - Sir Steel dons fake antlers to join the Deer Squad as they plan a surprise birthday party for Tina Turtle. // Sir Steel is infuriated when berries stain his new coat. Deer Squad must stop his mech-feet stamp stompers from destroying the berry bushes.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair - It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him! // Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: S'Mores - Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Pups Save a Blimp / Pups Save a Chili Cook-Out - Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger who plans ot use it to change the weather in Foggy Bottom. // Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the Chilli cook-off.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Pups Save a Teeny Penguin / Pups Save the Cat Show - Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin and end up floating out to sea on a homemade bridge. // Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running amuck! If they're not rounded up, the Cat Show will be ruined.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish / Sleeping Like a Baby - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Tour Fishies / Sorry Not Sorry - When Finnegan Travelfins leaves Carnivore Cove out of his travel guide, Baby and William make a video to show off their town! // Shadow's insincere apologies put a strain on his friendship with Bait and Switch.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Shrunken Ships / The Pirate Parade - When Escarlata turns the crew tiny, they have to find a pint-sized way to save the day. // It's time for the annual Pirate Parade! That is, unless Escarlata has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Deep Freeze / The Trojan Seahorse - The biggest party of the year could be cancelled after Escarlata la Pirata freezes the high seas! // Bonnie Bones is on the run with the museum's priceless treasures, but Santi and crew won't let her get far.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Windy Autumn Day - It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppa’s ball blows into the pond and George’s hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise - Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Sun, Sea and Snow - Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Computer - Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse - Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Pottery - Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep519
programme.desc: George's New Dinosaur - When his favorite toy dinosaur loses its tail, George visits Mr Fox's Shop to find a new one.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep512
programme.desc: The Mechanic Team! - Blaze stops into Gabby's Garage for a quick repair - just as she gets an alert! Three far-flung trucks need her mechanical know-how! So, Blaze and AJ volunteer to help her take her garage on the go!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep704
programme.desc: Knights in Sparkling Armor - When Crusher and Pickle are trapped inside a cage over a bubbling slime swap, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle to become...Knights! Will they be able to rescue Crusher and Pickle from the swamp before it's too late?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Pups Save Daring Danny X / Pups in a Fix - Daring Danny X takes his ambitions too far when he attempts a jump over Rattle Snake Canyon! The Paw Patrol wows with a mid-air rescue. // RoboDog’s wiring gets mixed up, and he goes on a fixing rampage around Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Pups Save a Stinky Flower / Pups Save a Monkey-Naut - Mayor Humdinger drops off a ‘gift’ to Mayor Goodway, a flower that spreads a horrible stink when it blooms. // Mayor Goodway tries to return it to him, but runs into trouble and has to be rescued by the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Wavey Jones' Locker - Baby Shark and William must travel to the deep dark depths to retrieve Baby's lost microphone.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Paddington and The House Guest / Paddington and The Banana - Mr. Curry is invited by Paddington to stay with the Browns whilst his flooded house is being repaired. He thinks the Browns are too disorganized. // Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the café without paying for it.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector - It's snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat given him by Aunt Lucy and must find it. // Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Peppa and George's Garden - Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Flying Vet - Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Kylie Kangeroo - Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Good Morning Mr. Grumpfish! - The Bubble Guppies have a substitute teacher: Mr. Grumpfish. He doesn't seem to like anything! It'll take a lot for the kids to convince Mr. Grumpfish that their favorite things are worth singing about!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Blue and Little Rainbow Riding Hood - Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure of Clue Lagoon - Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Princess and the Pirate Puppy / Caracol Cove - Santi and crew will have to team up with a pirate puppy to stop Bonnie Bones and save an old friend. // Enrique's new gold-digging machine threatens Lorelai's home.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Chicken Abuelo - Tomás accidentally turns Abuelo into a chicken!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Toothpaste Tumble - Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep209
programme.desc: The Finship Trap - When Baby discovers Hank and Goldie aren't speaking to each other, he concocts an elaborate plan to bring them back together.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Pups Save a Manatee - Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi need help from the PAW Patrol to a get a manatee to the swamp.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Pups Save a School Bus / Pups Save the Songbirds - When all the tires on the Adventure Bay school bus blow out, Ryder volunteers to use the Paw Patroller as a substitute school bus. // When the famous singing songbirds of Adventure Bay go missing, it's PAW Patrol to the rescue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep422
programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep249
programme.desc: The Powercut - One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppa’s house is plunged into darkness. There has been a power cut. While they wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch and thinking of games to play.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep119
programme.desc: Hidey Hup - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po drive to the Hidey Hup in the Tubby Car. They enjoy going on the Tubby Bouncy, the Tubby Uppy Downy, the Tubby Spinny and the Tubby Slidey.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Boots - Dee encourages a friend to say boots and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep43
programme.desc: Movie Night - It's the team's favourite night of the week... movie night! But then the Pizza Delivery Blocker gets in their way!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) Ep27
programme.desc: It's Time to go Beach Combing - When JoJo and Gran Gran visit the beach, JoJo is surprised to find the sea is much further away as the tide is out. Together, they see what interesting things they can find.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Backyard Beach - Monty and Stan are packing the car for a trip to the beach, but when the car breaks down and the trip is cancelled, Monty wonders whether you can have can have a fun day out without ever leaving your home.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Animal Pals - Jimmy Jones grows jealous when Monty brings home the class guinea pig for the weekend, leading them to wonder if being best friends means that you can't have other friends too.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep49
programme.desc: Baby Race - Mum reminisces about Bluey and Judo as babies. Bluey learnt to roll over first, but Judo was the first to crawl, so then it became a race to see who was going to walk first.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep10
programme.desc: The Cheese Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak when Roly inadvertently goes on the run with the world's smelliest cheese, earning their Cheese badges in the process.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep9
programme.desc: The Tree Badge - Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the amazing things trees do for the creatures who live amongst them, and earn their tree badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep8
programme.desc: The Big Day Out Badge - Duggee takes the Squirrels and their parents on an exciting mystery trip to a surprising destination, where they learn they can make anywhere special and earn their Big Day Out badges in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep34
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Mudslide - It's a very rainy day at the Go Jet Academy and the Go Jetters are teaching the Cadets some crucial Go Jetter skills.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep33
programme.desc: The Sphinx, Egypt - Glitch and the Grimbots are on holiday in Egypt where the Grimbots bury the Great Sphinx in sand, leaving only its head showing.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep48
programme.desc: Typewriter - Bluey, Snickers, and Winton are on their way to ask Calypso for help with their problems, when they are ambushed by the Terriers and use their unique talents to get past.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep47
programme.desc: Dunny - Mum bans the girls from saying the word 'dunny' because it's not a word the Queen of England would use, but the kids try and trick her into saying it anyway.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Andy and the Wood Ducks - Andy jets off to the flooded forests of North America in search of wood duck chicks.

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Teeny Tiny Creatures (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Ladybirds - Rory and Sandy look for the top pest controllers: ladybirds. Ferne meets some beetles.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: Coconutters - Cook and Line are in a party mood, but the fruit smoothies they make are not to Captain Sinker's taste.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep7
programme.desc: The Pen Pal Badge - Duggee arranges for the Squirrels to write to some pen pals, helping them to learn all about life in far away places, earning their Pen Pal badges and making some new friends in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: The Being Quiet Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on an adventure to find a famously shy creature called The Snard who doesn't like noise time to earn their Being Quiet badges!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep5
programme.desc: The Get Indoors Badge - A weather warning from Duggee's barometer leads the Squirrels to round up all the creatures they can find outside and pile into the clubhouse for an impromptu party.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep32
programme.desc: Everglades National Park, Florida - The Go Jetters save the Florida Everglades when hungry alligators chase Glitch's picnic.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep31
programme.desc: Timgad Ruins, Algeria - The Go Jetters visit Timgad in Algeria, but someone is playing games with their click-ons.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep16
programme.desc: Whiff's Wish - Whiff brings some empty rubbish trucks to the docks and pulls up next to Spencer, who has brought the Mayor to meet a friend. The Mayor compliments Spencer, which makes Whiff very impressed.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep34
programme.desc: Brolly Bus - When Umbrella gets left on the bus, Sarah and Duck head to the bus depot in search of their friend.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep33
programme.desc: Whatsathingy - Sarah & Duck try to work out exactly what it is that Scarf Lady has been busily knitting in her sleep.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Hot Foot - When the sand heats up, Nelly and Nora hot foot it around the beach.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep10

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep75
programme.desc: Get It Wrong To Get It Right - Monty is sad when he messes up his paper plane creation, but Gran teaches him that a person can learn from their mistakes.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: The Thing That Was Mine - Tony finds a bone but another dino takes it from him, saying it belonged to her first.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep42
programme.desc: Good Clean Fun - The high point of a window cleaner's career could be a low point, if Team Tinpo can't help him with his fear of heights.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep41
programme.desc: Scrub-A-Dub-Pup - Granny Po loves her puppy, but her puppy loves lying in a muddy flowerbed. Can the team help her out of this muddle?

programme.desc: Fremantle and Richmond fans started the season with high hopes of a spot in the Finals. But after slow starts in 2023, can the Dockers or the Tigers build towards a Top 8 finish in the second half of the season?

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep16

programme.title: Four Corners Ep19
programme.desc: Fearless and forensic investigative journalism from the award-winning team who claimed Australian journalism's top honour the 2022 Gold Walkley Award.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep18

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep46
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Road To UFC Season 2 Ep4
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC Season 2 is the most significant opportunity for Asia's top MMA prospects to make it to the world stage. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. The event will be held in front of a live audience and the episodes will be produced and distributed for live broadcast using Remote Integration Model production (REMI) from UFC’s state-of-the-art Broadcast Operations Center (BOC) at UFC Apex in Las Vegas in the USA. The event will mark the first live UFC telecasts to be produced entirely remotely, utilizing the new IP-based, 4K-capable BOC and leveraging the expertise of UFC’s full-time production team.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Champs Only - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep902BlachowiczvsAdesanya
programme.desc: At UFC 259, middleweight champion Israel Adesanya stepped up in weight as he sought a second belt taking on newly minted light heavyweight champion Jan Blachowicz. See both men train and prepare for their battle for 205-pound gold

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep2
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep16
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep10
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC The Walk EpUFC253AdesanyavsCosta
programme.desc: UFC The Walk gives fight fans a retrospective look back at some of the most iconic moments in combat sports history. Re-live the experience of UFC champions and challengers as they prepare for their biggest fights, and get an in-depth look at their performances inside the Octagon

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2313
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 Shark Grand Prix de France Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The French city and circuit of Le Mans are synonymous with motorsport - having hosted two and four wheel races and endurance events for many years. Le Mans first held a motorcycle Grand Prix event in 1969, when the great Giacomo Agostini won the 500cc race, lapping all the other riders on his MV Agusta. The modern circuit has been a permanent fixture on the MotoGP™ calendar since 2000. Local French fans are knowledgeable and passionate about their racing, with a boisterous atmosphere at races. French riders of different eras and in different classes such as Johann Zarco, Christian Sarron, Olivier Jacque, Arnaud Vincent, Guy Bertin, Randy de Puniet and Mike Di Meglio have brought their country race wins and titles, adding to France’s significant racing heritage.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2313
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Kara France vs Albazi
programme.desc: Prelims - Rapidly becoming the most exciting division in the UFC, the flyweight class will take center stage on June 3, when Kai Kara-France and Amir Albazi face off in a five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas. In the hunt for a shot at the title, New Zealand’s Kara-France has won three of his last four, living up to his “Don’t Blink” nickname with a blistering finish of former world champion Cody Garbrandt. But getting past Albazi will be no easy task, as the rising star has won all four of his UFC bouts, most recently an impressive knockout of Alessandro Costa

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Kara France vs Albazi
programme.desc: Main Event - Rapidly becoming the most exciting division in the UFC, the flyweight class will take center stage on June 3, when Kai Kara-France and Amir Albazi face off in a five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas. In the hunt for a shot at the title, New Zealand’s Kara-France has won three of his last four, living up to his “Don’t Blink” nickname with a blistering finish of former world champion Cody Garbrandt. But getting past Albazi will be no easy task, as the rising star has won all four of his UFC bouts, most recently an impressive knockout of Alessandro Costa

programme.title: Road To UFC Season 2 Ep4
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC Season 2 is the most significant opportunity for Asia's top MMA prospects to make it to the world stage. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. The event will be held in front of a live audience and the episodes will be produced and distributed for live broadcast using Remote Integration Model production (REMI) from UFC’s state-of-the-art Broadcast Operations Center (BOC) at UFC Apex in Las Vegas in the USA. The event will mark the first live UFC telecasts to be produced entirely remotely, utilizing the new IP-based, 4K-capable BOC and leveraging the expertise of UFC’s full-time production team.

programme.title: UFC The Walk EpUFC257PoiriervsMcGregor2
programme.desc: UFC The Walk gives fight fans a retrospective look back at some of the most iconic moments in combat sports history. Re-live the experience of UFC champions and challengers as they prepare for their biggest fights, and get an in-depth look at their performances inside the Octagon.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2313
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 Shark Grand Prix de France Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The French city and circuit of Le Mans are synonymous with motorsport - having hosted two and four wheel races and endurance events for many years. Le Mans first held a motorcycle Grand Prix event in 1969, when the great Giacomo Agostini won the 500cc race, lapping all the other riders on his MV Agusta. The modern circuit has been a permanent fixture on the MotoGP™ calendar since 2000. Local French fans are knowledgeable and passionate about their racing, with a boisterous atmosphere at races. French riders of different eras and in different classes such as Johann Zarco, Christian Sarron, Olivier Jacque, Arnaud Vincent, Guy Bertin, Randy de Puniet and Mike Di Meglio have brought their country race wins and titles, adding to France’s significant racing heritage.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2313
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Kara France vs Albazi
programme.desc: Prelims - Rapidly becoming the most exciting division in the UFC, the flyweight class will take center stage on June 3, when Kai Kara-France and Amir Albazi face off in a five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas. In the hunt for a shot at the title, New Zealand’s Kara-France has won three of his last four, living up to his “Don’t Blink” nickname with a blistering finish of former world champion Cody Garbrandt. But getting past Albazi will be no easy task, as the rising star has won all four of his UFC bouts, most recently an impressive knockout of Alessandro Costa
